properties.title: Case identifier
properties.description: Unique identifier of the case definition.

properties.title: Id
properties.description: Unique identifier of the element.

properties.title: Name
properties.description: The descriptive name of the CMMN element.

properties.title: Documentation
properties.description: The descriptive name of the CMMN element.

properties.title: Blocking
properties.description: Boolean property, default true. If false the task will automatically complete the task after executing any associated logic

properties.title: Blocking expression
properties.description: An expression to control at runtime whether this task is blocking or not. When set, the value of the blocking property is ignored.

properties.title: Initiator variable name
properties.description: Sets the variable name to be used for the case initiator value.

properties.title: Case author
properties.description: Author of the case definition.

properties.title: Case version string (documentation only)
properties.description: Version identifier for documentation purpose.

properties.title: Target namespace
properties.description: Target namespace for the case definition.

properties.title: Assignments
properties.description: Assignment definition for the user task

properties.title: Form properties
properties.description: Definition of the form with a list of form properties

properties.title: Form key
properties.description: Form key that provides a reference to a form.

properties.title: Due date
properties.description: Due date of the user task.

properties.title: Priority
properties.description: Priority of the user task.

properties.title: Class
properties.description: Class that implements the service task logic.

properties.title: Expression
properties.description: Service task logic defined with an expression.

properties.title: Delegate expression
properties.description: Service task logic defined with a delegate expression.

properties.title: Class fields
properties.description: Field extensions

properties.title: Result variable name
properties.description: Process variable name to store the service task result.

properties.title: Script format
properties.description: Script format of the script task.

properties.title: Script
properties.description: Script text of the script task.

properties.title: Asynchronous
properties.description: Indicates if the task needs to be executed asynchronously.

properties.title: Exclusive
properties.description: Indicates if an asynchronous task must be executed exclusively

properties.title: To
properties.description: The recipients if the e-mail. Multiple recipients are defined in a comma-separated list.

properties.title: From
properties.description: The sender e-mail address. If not provided, the default configured from address is used.

properties.title: Subject
properties.description: The subject of the e-mail.

properties.title: Cc
properties.description: The cc's of the e-mail. Multiple recipients are defined in a comma-separated list

properties.title: Bcc
properties.description: The bcc's of the e-mail. Multiple recipients are defined in a comma-separated list

properties.title: Text
properties.description: The content of the e-mail, in case one needs to send plain none-rich e-mails. Can be used in combination with html, for e-mail clients that don't support rich content. The client will then fall back to this text-only alternative.

properties.title: Html
properties.description: A piece of HTML that is the content of the e-mail.

properties.title: Charset
properties.description: Allows to change the charset of the email, which is necessary for many non-English languages.

properties.title: Request method
properties.description: Request method (For example - GET,POST,PUT etc).

properties.title: Request URL
properties.description: Request URL (For example - http://flowable.org).

properties.title: Request headers
properties.description: Line separated HTTP request headers (For example - Content-Type: application/json).

properties.title: Request body
properties.description: Request body (For example- ${sampleBody}).

properties.title: Request timeout
properties.description: Timeout in milliseconds for the request (For example - 5000).

properties.title: Disallow redirects
properties.description: Flag to disallow HTTP redirects.

properties.title: Fail status codes
properties.description: Comma separated list of HTTP response status codes to retry, for example 400,5XX.

properties.title: Handle status codes
properties.description: Comma separated list of HTTP response status codes to ignore, for example 404,3XX.

properties.title: Ignore exception
properties.description: Flag to ignore exceptions.

properties.title: Response variable name
properties.description: Define the variable name to store the http response.

properties.title: Save request variables
properties.description: Flag to save request variables.

properties.title: Save response status, headers
properties.description: Flag to save response status, headers etc.

properties.title: Result variable prefix
properties.description: Prefix for the execution variable names.

properties.title: Text
properties.description: The text of the text annotation.

properties.title: Form reference
properties.description: Reference to a form

properties.title: Decision table reference
properties.description: Set the decision table reference

properties.title: Throw error if no rules were hit
properties.description: Should an error be thrown if no rules of the decision table were hit and consequently no result was found.

properties.title: Request method
properties.description: Request method (For example - GET,POST,PUT etc).

properties.title: Request URL
properties.description: Request URL (For example - http://flowable.org).

properties.title: Request headers
properties.description: Line separated HTTP request headers (For example - Content-Type: application/json).

properties.title: Request body
properties.description: Request body (For example- ${sampleBody}).

properties.title: Request timeout
properties.description: Timeout in milliseconds for the request (For example - 5000).

properties.title: Disallow redirects
properties.description: Flag to disallow HTTP redirects.

properties.title: Fail status codes
properties.description: Comma separated list of HTTP response status codes to retry, for example 400,5XX.

properties.title: Handle status codes
properties.description: Comma separated list of HTTP response status codes to ignore, for example 404,3XX.

properties.title: Ignore exception
properties.description: Flag to ignore exceptions.

properties.title: Response variable name
properties.description: Define the variable name to store the http response.

properties.title: Save request variables
properties.description: Flag to save request variables.

properties.title: Save response status, headers
properties.description: Flag to save response status, headers etc.

properties.title: Result variable prefix
properties.description: Prefix for the execution variable names.

properties.title: Save response as a transient variable
properties.description: Flag indicating to store the response variable(s) transient

properties.title: Save response as JSON
properties.description: Flag indicating to store the response variable as a JSON variable instead of a String

properties.title: Case reference
properties.description: Set the case reference

properties.title: Process reference
properties.description: Set the process reference

properties.title: In parameters
properties.description: Definition of the input parameters

properties.title: Out parameters
properties.description: Definition of the output parameters

properties.title: Timer Expression
properties.description: An ISO-8601 string or an expression that resolves to either an ISO-8601 string or a java.util.Date

properties.title: Start trigger plan item
properties.description: A reference to the plan item for which the configured standard event needs to happen to start the timer (optional)

properties.title: Start trigger transition event
properties.description: The type of the transition event. Only used when the start trigger plan item is set

properties.title: Decision reference
properties.description: Set the decision reference

properties.title: Condition
properties.description: An expression that must be true to satisfy the sentry

properties.title: Auto complete
properties.description: Flag indicating that the stage will automatically complete, once all required children are in an end state and no other children are active.

properties.title: Auto complete condition
properties.description: An expression that is resolved to if the stage can automatically complere.

properties.title: Required
properties.description: Flag indicating if the stage, task or milestone is required when determining the parent stage completion. By default false.

properties.title: Required Rule
properties.description: An expression that is resolved to determine if the stage, task or milestone is required when determining the parent stage completion.

properties.title: Repetition
properties.description: Flag indicating if repetition is enabled

properties.title: Repetition Rule
properties.description: An expression that is resolved to determine if new instances of the planitem need to be created

properties.title: Repetition counter variable
properties.description: The name of the local variable which stores the instance counter of the repetition. Default value is 'repetitionCounter'.

properties.title: Manual activation
properties.description: Flag indicating if the task or stage needs to be manually activated. False by default.

properties.title: Manual activation Rule
properties.description: An expression that is resolved to determine if the stage or task needs to be manually activated.

properties.title: Completion neutral
properties.description: Flag indicating if the plan item is completion neutral. False by default.

properties.title: Completion neutral Rule
properties.description: An expression that is resolved to determine if the plan item is completion neutral.

properties.title: Script format
properties.description: Script format of the script task (JavaScript, groovy, etc).

properties.title: Script
properties.description: Script text of the script task.

properties.title: Transition event type
properties.description: The type of the transition event

stencils.title: CMMN-Diagram
stencils.view:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>
<svg
   xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
   xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
   xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"
   xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"
   width="800"
   height="600"
   version="1.0">
  <defs></defs>
  <g pointer-events="fill" >
    <polygon stroke="black" fill="black" stroke-width="1" points="0,0 0,590 9,599 799,599 799,9 790,0" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" />
    <rect id="diagramcanvas" oryx:resize="vertical horizontal" x="0" y="0" width="790" height="590" stroke="black" stroke-width="2" fill="white" />
    	<text font-size="22" id="diagramtext" x="400" y="25" oryx:align="top center" stroke="#373e48"></text>
  </g>
</svg>

stencils.title: Service task
stencils.description: An automatic task with service logic

stencils.title: Decision task
stencils.description: Task to invoke a DMN decision
stencils.view:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>
<svg
   xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
   xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
   xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"
   xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"

   width="102"
   height="82"
   version="1.0">
  <defs></defs>
  <oryx:magnets>
  	<oryx:magnet oryx:cx="1" oryx:cy="20" oryx:anchors="left" />
  	<oryx:magnet oryx:cx="1" oryx:cy="40" oryx:anchors="left" />
  	<oryx:magnet oryx:cx="1" oryx:cy="60" oryx:anchors="left" />
  	
  	<oryx:magnet oryx:cx="25" oryx:cy="79" oryx:anchors="bottom" />
  	<oryx:magnet oryx:cx="50" oryx:cy="79" oryx:anchors="bottom" />
  	<oryx:magnet oryx:cx="75" oryx:cy="79" oryx:anchors="bottom" />
  	
  	<oryx:magnet oryx:cx="99" oryx:cy="20" oryx:anchors="right" />
  	<oryx:magnet oryx:cx="99" oryx:cy="40" oryx:anchors="right" />
  	<oryx:magnet oryx:cx="99" oryx:cy="60" oryx:anchors="right" />
  	
  	<oryx:magnet oryx:cx="25" oryx:cy="1" oryx:anchors="top" />
  	<oryx:magnet oryx:cx="50" oryx:cy="1" oryx:anchors="top" />
  	<oryx:magnet oryx:cx="75" oryx:cy="1" oryx:anchors="top" />
  	
  	<oryx:magnet oryx:cx="50" oryx:cy="40" oryx:default="yes" />
  </oryx:magnets>
  <g pointer-events="fill" oryx:minimumSize="50 40">
	<rect id="text_frame" oryx:anchors="bottom top right left" x="1" y="1" width="94" height="79" rx="10" ry="10" stroke="none" stroke-width="0" fill="none" />
	<rect id="bg_frame" oryx:resize="vertical horizontal" x="0" y="0" width="100" height="80" rx="10" ry="10" stroke="#bbbbbb" stroke-width="1" fill="#f9f9f9" />
		<text 
			font-size="12" 
			id="text_name" 
			x="50" 
			y="40" 
			oryx:align="middle center"
			oryx:fittoelem="text_frame"
			stroke="#373e48">
		</text>
	
	<g id="decisionTask" transform="translate(4,3)">
		<path oryx:anchors="top left"
			 d="m 1,2 0,14 16,0 0,-14 z m 1.45458,5.6000386 2.90906,0 0,2.7999224 -2.90906,0 z m 4.36364,0 8.72718,0 0,2.7999224 -8.72718,0 z m -4.36364,4.1998844 2.90906,0 0,2.800116 -2.90906,0 z m 4.36364,0 8.72718,0 0,2.800116 -8.72718,0 z" style="fill:#72a7d0;stroke:none" /></g><g id="required" display="inherit" stroke="#000000"><g oryx:anchors="bottom"><path fill="none" oryx:anchors="bottom" d="M49 67 L49 74 M49 76 L49 78" transform="translate(-11,0)"></path></g></g><g id="repetition" oryx:anchors="bottom"><path oryx:anchors="bottom" fill="none" stroke="#bbbbbb" stroke-width="2" d="M47 68 v10 M50 68 v10 M53 68 v10" transform="translate(10,0)"/></g><g id="manualActivation" display="inherit" stroke="#000000" oryx:anchors="bottom"><path oryx:anchors="bottom" fill="none" d="M45.5 68 L54 73 L45.5 77 L45.5 69z" transform="translate(-2,0)"></path></g></g></svg>

stencils.title: Http task
stencils.view:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>
<svg
   xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
   xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
   xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"
   xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"

   width="102"
   height="82"
   version="1.0">
  <defs></defs>
  <oryx:magnets>
  	<oryx:magnet oryx:cx="1" oryx:cy="20" oryx:anchors="left" />
  	<oryx:magnet oryx:cx="1" oryx:cy="40" oryx:anchors="left" />
  	<oryx:magnet oryx:cx="1" oryx:cy="60" oryx:anchors="left" />
  	
  	<oryx:magnet oryx:cx="25" oryx:cy="79" oryx:anchors="bottom" />
  	<oryx:magnet oryx:cx="50" oryx:cy="79" oryx:anchors="bottom" />
  	<oryx:magnet oryx:cx="75" oryx:cy="79" oryx:anchors="bottom" />
  	
  	<oryx:magnet oryx:cx="99" oryx:cy="20" oryx:anchors="right" />
  	<oryx:magnet oryx:cx="99" oryx:cy="40" oryx:anchors="right" />
  	<oryx:magnet oryx:cx="99" oryx:cy="60" oryx:anchors="right" />
  	
  	<oryx:magnet oryx:cx="25" oryx:cy="1" oryx:anchors="top" />
  	<oryx:magnet oryx:cx="50" oryx:cy="1" oryx:anchors="top" />
  	<oryx:magnet oryx:cx="75" oryx:cy="1" oryx:anchors="top" />
  	
  	<oryx:magnet oryx:cx="50" oryx:cy="40" oryx:default="yes" />
  </oryx:magnets>
  <g pointer-events="fill" oryx:minimumSize="50 40">
	<rect id="text_frame" oryx:anchors="bottom top right left" x="1" y="1" width="94" height="79" rx="10" ry="10" stroke="none" stroke-width="0" fill="none" />
	<rect id="bg_frame" oryx:resize="vertical horizontal" x="0" y="0" width="100" height="80" rx="10" ry="10" stroke="#bbbbbb" stroke-width="1" fill="#f9f9f9" />
		<text

			x="50" 
			y="40" 
			oryx:align="middle center"
			oryx:fittoelem="text_frame"
			stroke="#373e48">
		</text>
    
	<g id="sendTask" transform="translate(4,3)">
	
	<!-- path here -->

			style="fill:#16964d;stroke:none;"
     		d="m 16.704699,5.9229055 q 0.358098,0 0.608767,0.2506681 0.250669,0.250668 0.250669,0.6087677 0,0.3580997 -0.250669,0.6087677 -0.250669,0.2506679 -0.608767,0.2506679 -0.358098,0 -0.608767,-0.2506679 -0.250669,-0.250668 -0.250669,-0.6087677 0,-0.3580997 0.250669,-0.6087677 0.250669,-0.2506681 0.608767,-0.2506681 z m 2.578308,-2.0053502 q -2.229162,0 -3.854034,0.6759125 -1.624871,0.6759067 -3.227361,2.2694472 -0.716197,0.725146 -1.575633,1.7457293 L 7.2329969,8.7876913 Q 7.0897576,8.8055849 7.000233,8.9309334 L 4.9948821,12.368677 q -0.035811,0.06267 -0.035811,0.143242 0,0.107426 0.080572,0.205905 l 0.5729577,0.572957 q 0.125334,0.116384 0.2864786,0.07162 l 2.4708789,-0.760963 2.5156417,2.515645 -0.76096,2.470876 q -0.009,0.02687 -0.009,0.08057 0,0.125338 0.08058,0.205905 l 0.572957,0.572958 q 0.170096,0.152194 0.349146,0.04476 l 3.437744,-2.005351 q 0.125335,-0.08953 0.143239,-0.232763 l 0.17905,-3.392986 q 1.02058,-0.859435 1.745729,-1.575629 1.67411,-1.6830612 2.309735,-3.2049805 0.635625,-1.5219191 0.635625,-3.8585111 0,-0.1253369 -0.08505,-0.2148575 -0.08505,-0.089526 -0.201431,-0.089526 z " /></g><g id="required" display="inherit" stroke="#000000"><g oryx:anchors="bottom"><path fill="none" oryx:anchors="bottom" d="M49 67 L49 74 M49 76 L49 78" transform="translate(-11,0)"></path></g></g><g id="repetition" oryx:anchors="bottom"><path oryx:anchors="bottom" fill="none" stroke="#bbbbbb" stroke-width="2" d="M47 68 v10 M50 68 v10 M53 68 v10" transform="translate(10,0)"/></g><g id="manualActivation" display="inherit" stroke="#000000" oryx:anchors="bottom"><path oryx:anchors="bottom" fill="none" d="M45.5 68 L54 73 L45.5 77 L45.5 69z" transform="translate(-2,0)"></path></g></g></svg>

stencils.title: Script task
stencils.description: An automatic task with script logic
stencils.view:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>
<svg
   xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
   xmlns:svg="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
   xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"
   xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink"

   width="102"
   height="82"
   version="1.0">
  <defs></defs>
  <oryx:magnets>
  	<oryx:magnet oryx:cx="1" oryx:cy="20" oryx:anchors="left" />
  	<oryx:magnet oryx:cx="1" oryx:cy="40" oryx:anchors="left" />
  	<oryx:magnet oryx:cx="1" oryx:cy="60" oryx:anchors="left" />
  	
  	<oryx:magnet oryx:cx="25" oryx:cy="79" oryx:anchors="bottom" />
  	<oryx:magnet oryx:cx="50" oryx:cy="79" oryx:anchors="bottom" />
  	<oryx:magnet oryx:cx="75" oryx:cy="79" oryx:anchors="bottom" />
  	
  	<oryx:magnet oryx:cx="99" oryx:cy="20" oryx:anchors="right" />
  	<oryx:magnet oryx:cx="99" oryx:cy="40" oryx:anchors="right" />
  	<oryx:magnet oryx:cx="99" oryx:cy="60" oryx:anchors="right" />
  	
  	<oryx:magnet oryx:cx="25" oryx:cy="1" oryx:anchors="top" />
  	<oryx:magnet oryx:cx="50" oryx:cy="1" oryx:anchors="top" />
  	<oryx:magnet oryx:cx="75" oryx:cy="1" oryx:anchors="top" />
  	
  	<oryx:magnet oryx:cx="50" oryx:cy="40" oryx:default="yes" />
  </oryx:magnets>
  <g pointer-events="fill" oryx:minimumSize="50 40">
	<rect id="text_frame" oryx:anchors="bottom top right left" x="1" y="1" width="94" height="79" rx="10" ry="10" stroke="none" stroke-width="0" fill="none" />
	<rect id="bg_frame" oryx:resize="vertical horizontal" x="0" y="0" width="100" height="80" rx="10" ry="10" stroke="#bbbbbb" stroke-width="1" fill="#f9f9f9" />
		<text 
			font-size="12" 
			id="text_name" 
			x="50" 
			y="40" 
			oryx:align="middle center"
			oryx:fittoelem="text_frame"
			stroke="#373e48">
		</text>
	
	<g id="scriptTask" transform="translate(2,2)">
		<path oryx:anchors="top left"
			d="m 5,2 0,0.094 c 0.23706,0.064 0.53189,0.1645 0.8125,0.375 0.5582,0.4186 1.05109,1.228 1.15625,2.5312 l 8.03125,0 1,0 1,0 c 0,-3 -2,-3 -2,-3 l -10,0 z M 4,3 4,13 2,13 c 0,3 2,3 2,3 l 9,0 c 0,0 2,0 2,-3 L 15,6 6,6 6,5.5 C 6,4.1111 5.5595,3.529 5.1875,3.25 4.8155,2.971 4.5,3 4.5,3 L 4,3 z"
     		style="fill:#72a7d0;stroke:none"
		/>
	</g><g id="required" display="inherit" stroke="#000000"><g oryx:anchors="bottom"><path fill="none" oryx:anchors="bottom" d="M49 67 L49 74 M49 76 L49 78" transform="translate(-11,0)"></path></g></g><g id="repetition" oryx:anchors="bottom"><path oryx:anchors="bottom" fill="none" stroke="#bbbbbb" stroke-width="2" d="M47 68 v10 M50 68 v10 M53 68 v10" transform="translate(10,0)"/></g><g id="manualActivation" display="inherit" stroke="#000000" oryx:anchors="bottom"><path oryx:anchors="bottom" fill="none" d="M45.5 68 L54 73 L45.5 77 L45.5 69z" transform="translate(-2,0)"></path></g></g></svg>

stencils.title: Association
stencils.description: Associates a sentry with a plan item.
stencils.view:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?>
<svg
	xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
	xmlns:oryx="http://www.b3mn.org/oryx"
	version="1.0"
	oryx:edge="edge" >
	<g id="edge">
	    <path id="bg_frame" d="M10 50 L210 50" stroke="#585858" fill="none" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="3, 4" />
		<text id="name" x="0" y="0" oryx:edgePosition="midTop" oryx:offsetTop="6" style="font-size:9px;"/>
	</g>
</svg>
